Desc.entry: A voluntary group that practises holistic healing, laying on of hands, absent healing and advice and counselling. All healers are registered Yorkshire Healers, International Healing Association and NFSH registered. Accepted by BMA and EEC registered. Visit hospitals and doctors' surgeries to give talks to doctors and nursing staff. Can also give talks and demonstrations to groups. Service is free but donations are invited to cover hire of hall. Self or any referral.

ProvisionPlaceDisabledAccess.entry: Infra red hearing system, Voice synthesiser/visual display in lift, Braille plan of building
